articles.description: Check out the mortgage rates for Sept. 3, 2021, which are unchanged from yesterday.
articles.content:
Based on data compiled by Credible, mortgage rates have remained unchanged since yesterday.
  • 30-year fixed mortgage rates: 2.750%, unchanged
  • 20-year fixed mortgage rates: 2.500%, unch… [+9996 chars]
